About Me

Let me tell you a few things about me...

BIO

Hi, Currently, I am a computer science student and in my 5th semester at Copenhagen School of Design and Technology, Denmark (KÃ¸benhavns Erhversakademi - KEA). Coming from a science background as a Microbiologist, I like to query how and why? Hence, I like embarking on writing codes that would give value to the end user. I am currently looking for opportunities to explore and apply the knowledge I have gained in school and use such in the corporate world in solving problems. I love collaborating with others to proffer the best solutions and open to earning new technologies that will enhance my skills. See some of my works in 'My Works'

Front End Developer

I love working with HTML, CSS, bootstrap, SASS and JavaScript to create pages that meet the requirements of the project. Creating a good looking website is enhanced by good UX design. Hence, I had to learn how to do same in the course of my education.

Full Stack Developer

Creating dynamic websites that gives the user a unique and custom experience every time they log on to the website. I have used technologies like spring and node.js to create dynamic web pages in the course of my education. I have also worked with Databases like MYSQL and MongoDB, especially using cloud storages like AWS and ATLAS.

CMS Content Creator

Using content management systems live Wordpress, Joomla, Wix and Nicepage has made web development easier and faster. I have created pages with Wordpress, using elementor as the main plugin to create nice looking website. I am currently experimenting with Nicepage.
